features: 【Hi-Fi Stereo Sound Quality】Enjoy crisp, distortion-free Hi-Fi sound with 2 full-range dual-magnet speaker units of Nylavee computer speakers, creating remarkable, precision quality sound.

【Unique Speaker Ports for Deep Bass】Designed with 2 unique speaker ports, resulting in a strong vibration energy for a concentrated and rich bass sound. This will quickly be your favorite computer speakers for your desktop or laptop for movies, videos and gaming.

【Touch Control Lighting】6 touch-controlled lighting modes - symphony, flowing, breathing and 3 solid colors, are designed into the speakers for pc to personalize your desktop, heightening your gaming and listening enjoyment.
【Easy to Control】Turn pc speakers on/off and adjust volume smoothly with 0ne simple knob. No need to use multiple buttons or computer to adjust the volume.
【Plug and Play】Equipped with a USB cable and 3.5mm audio cable, the gaming speaker is plug-and-play for a wide range of PC, laptop, phone, or tablet compatibility (No drivers needed).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price for great speakers
reviews.reviewText: These speakers were the perfect addition to my set up. The sound is great and the RGB lights are smooth and VERY beautiful to look at. The setup is easy and the volume knob is responsive and quiet. I've had other speakers where the knob is either squeaky or sounds like a ratchet. The sleek design is simple with a matte black finish. This brings all the attention to the beautiful RGB design on the front is customizable to solid colors or the rainbow stream effect. The speakers don't force a power source from the wall, opting out for a simple USB connection to the pc, console or brick if you prefer. I only wish the sound output was shared with the USB cable instead of using the old 3.5mm connection but that is not a matter of function, just a matter of taste. The sound is clear and really loud for their size especially in a smaller room. Decent lows for not having a powered subwoofer and crisp highs. Only a small amount of distortion at full volume on the knob and from sound source. Overall, the speakers are a good set for the price. They look good, they sound good and are reliable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good looks and decent sound at low price
reviews.reviewText: The Nylavee SK400 speakers are a good choice for anyone who wants desktop speakers for playing games or watching movies. They are easy to use with a variety of sources, simple to control with a big volume knob, and have some cool LED lighting modes as well.They come with built-in cables: one cable that connects the left speaker to the right, and a pair of cables that connect to a sound source and to a power source. These cables are not removable, but they have generous length – the speakers can be up to 36 inches apart from each other, and the right speaker can be as much as 48 inches away from the sound & power sources. In other words, the left speaker can be as much as 7 feet away from the source. This makes it possible to place these 3 feet apart from each other on a desktop, and run the source cables down to a computer under the desk. The sound cable plugs into a 3.5mm audio or aux port, and the power cable plugs into a USB type A port. The USB cable is for power only, not for digital sound. The sound cable is analog only, which means the sound source can be a computer, laptop, tablet, smartphone, mp3 player – any device that has a headphone jack. In addition, the power source can be a power bank that has a USB port with 5V output. This makes these speakers able to be used in a variety of ways, but they are not built to be portable nor designed to be used outdoors. They’re not too heavy but they are not rugged or weatherproof.These speakers have a sound quality and loudness that is surprising for a mere USB power source. They have good stereo separation and a decent sound-stage as can be expected from their placement 3 feet apart. But with a simple turn of the big volume knob they can get loud, much louder than some near-field personal desktop speakers. I tested these in a large meeting hall and they filled the space with sound that could be heard throughout. At maximum volume level there was no more discernible distortion than at lower volume, and the sound was fairly balanced with no over- or under-emphasis on a certain frequency. These are not neutral studio-quality reference monitors by any means, but for what they are for this price, they are good enough for gaming or movies. The many other positive reviews here also indicate that these will not disappoint any reasonable expectations of sound quality.The icing on this cake is the cool LED lighting, which can be switched between several modes easily with the touch of a button on top of the right speaker. The button cycles between modes so simply keep pressing until you find the one you want. Some modes are colorful and static or dynamic, while other modes keep to only one of a few different colors, to complement the mood of the game or movie soundtrack. The lighting is bright, so that in a dark room they grab your attention. During movies they can be distracting when set on a mode with movement, but when set on a static mode they can provide some helpful ambient lighting. The zig-zag design of the LED is the same direction on both speakers, which would have been cooler if they went in opposite directions like a mirror image of each other. Maybe the next version of this model could be designed this way.Besides the brightness of the lighting and lack of symmetric design, these speakers don’t have much to criticize. They are meant to be stood upright, with little rubber pads on their bottoms to dampen vibrations, so they aren’t meant to lay on their sides. They stand vertically upright, with no angle in their design to direct the sound upwards from desktop to the listener’s ears in seated position. They have only one control knob, for volume – which has a nice feel, but there are no other controls for adjusting the sound. None of these are deal-breakers, just compromises that make these speakers simple to set up and easy to use with a variety of devices and power sources. Yet with their good sound and cool lighting, they are more than just your basic pair of desktop computer speakers. Overall, they are a good deal for the low price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good speakers for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I recently acquired these speakers on July 29, 2023, and I must say, they've seamlessly integrated themselves into my daily routine. From gaming marathons to music jam sessions and even YouTube video binges, these speakers have become an integral part of my digital life.One of the first things that caught my attention was their aesthetic appeal. Placed elegantly beside my monitor, they add a touch of modernity to my setup. The color display, a subtle yet captivating feature, is a nice touch that enhances their visual appeal.Setting up the speakers was a breeze, thanks to the plug-and-play functionality. Connecting them to my existing setup was a matter of minutes, allowing me to get right into enjoying my content without any hassle. This simplicity is a major win in my book, as I'm all for technology that doesn't demand unnecessary time and effort.The true standout, however, is the sound quality. These speakers deliver a rich and immersive audio experience that I hadn't quite expected. The depth and clarity in their sound production are truly impressive. The presence of bass adds a dimension of depth that makes music tracks resonate and game sound effects rumble with a satisfying intensity. Whether I'm caught in the middle of an epic gaming battle or simply vibing to my favorite tunes, these speakers ensure that every sound is crisp and resonant.After using them for a substantial period, I can confidently say that my investment has been well worth it. These speakers have transformed my entertainment experience, elevating it to new heights. Their versatility in handling various types of content and their ability to consistently deliver impressive sound quality make them an asset to any multimedia setup.In conclusion, I am genuinely pleased with my decision to purchase these speakers. Their appealing design, effortless setup process, and exceptional sound production have earned them a permanent place in my daily routine. If you're looking to enhance your digital experiences with top-notch audio quality, these speakers are definitely worth considering.
Okay, so for 2.0 speakers, they are nice-looking and work as well as advertised. They're a little weak on the volume, but otherwise these are well worth their price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Sound Quality OK for Meetings - Not Good for Music
reviews.reviewText: These speakers look OK but the garish logo and the big old-fashioned volume knob are a bit of a turn-off. The RBG colour effects are subtle enough. The speakers are not too big and very light. Connection is via audio jack and it is powered via USB. The speakers are connected to each other with a wire.Volume is lacking - these speakers are not very loud and do not really have a warm, rounded sound. They are OK for amplifying speech in meetings, etc. but the sound is too tinny and has no bass to speak off, making these a poor choice for listening to music or when watching a film.Even at £56 (Black Friday deal, 2023), these speakers are not value for money.I have returned the speakers.

Plärrender Sound und zu leise - keine Empfehlung!Obwohl die RGB-Beleuchtung recht hübsch ist, lenkt sie bisweilen ab (dies ist natürlich recht subjektiv).Ich habe mir direkt ein Paar Boxen von Logitech bestellt (Logitech Z533) - diese sind deutlich besser.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These proved a short lived pleasure. They worked for a while but after a few months of not-very-intense use have blown - very distorted sound at anything other than low volume. Avoid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The sound quality is reasonable but got no bass whatsoever and that's the reason I have returned it. It doe's look good which is a plus. It should be fine for general use but not for purposes where you need to set or modify bass.
